page.title: 04WOODSIDE COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: At the community centre they cater for older adults. There are 4 clubs;{The {over fifties club},{The Darby and {Joans'club},{The Disabled club}and{The {Luncheon club}.The latter is for over fifties and takes place twice a week. All of these clubs organise trips out for 45 people. Clubs provided for the young are{The {Royce Royals marching jazz band},{The {Silver Wings dance troop and break {dancing.}All these organisations practice at the centre. Jumble sales and exhibitions are also held at the centre. The police call in at the centre from time to time. Private organisations on estate projects use the centre as a meeting place. The centre caters for birthday parties and weddings.
